name: task-management-system
description: Full-stack Task Management System with Node.js backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push
